item.title: .NET Inline C# Action Feature in Logic Apps: More Flexibility and Control for Developers
item.description: Microsoft has announced a significant enhancement to its Azure Logic Apps service by introducing .NET C# inline code execution. This new feature enables developers to call C# code directly within their workflows, providing greater flexibility and control over custom logic and complex operations.
